sync_connection_config_failed: Failed to sync connection configuration, please check backend service

size.title: File Too Large
size.messageImport: File size exceeds the limit and cannot be imported
size.messageExport: File size exceeds the limit and cannot be exported
size.suggestionImport: Please split the file into multiple files smaller than 10MB, or use streaming import
size.suggestionExport: Please reduce the amount of exported data or use batch export

encoding.title: File Encoding Error
encoding.message: Unable to parse file encoding correctly
encoding.suggestion: Please ensure the file uses UTF-8 encoding, or specify the correct encoding when importing

invalid.title: Invalid File Format
invalid.message: Unsupported file format or corrupted file
invalid.suggestion: Please check if the file format is correct and ensure the file is not corrupted

mismatch.title: File Format Mismatch
mismatch.message: File content does not match the selected format
mismatch.suggestion: Please verify the file format or select the correct import format

schema.title: Data Schema Validation Failed
schema.message: Data structure does not meet requirements
schema.suggestion: Please check the data structure and ensure all required fields are present

dataType.title: Data Type Error
dataType.message: Data type does not match the target table structure
dataType.suggestion: Please adjust the data type to match the target table requirements

constraint.title: Data Constraint Violation
constraint.message: Data does not meet constraint conditions
constraint.suggestion: Please check unique constraints, foreign key constraints, and other data integrity requirements

permission.title: {{operation}} Permission Denied
permission.suggestion: Please contact administrator to obtain the necessary permissions

space.title: Insufficient Space
space.suggestion: Please clean up disk space or choose another location

critical.title: Out of Memory
critical.suggestion: Recommend closing other applications, reducing query data volume, or restarting the application

high.title: High Memory Usage
high.message: System memory usage is too high
high.suggestion: Recommend optimizing query conditions or processing data in batches

leak.title: Memory Leak Detected
leak.suggestion: Please restart the application. If the problem persists, please contact technical support

cpu.title: High CPU Usage
cpu.suggestion: Please wait for the current operation to complete, or consider optimizing query complexity

critical.title: Disk Space Critical
critical.suggestion: Please clean up disk space immediately, otherwise the application may not work properly

high.title: Disk Space Low
high.message: Available disk space is less than {{threshold}}GB
high.suggestion: Recommend cleaning up unnecessary files to avoid affecting application performance

readonly.title: Disk Read-Only
readonly.suggestion: Please check disk permissions or contact system administrator

slow.title: Slow Network Connection
slow.suggestion: Please check network connection or try again later

unstable.title: Unstable Network
unstable.suggestion: Recommend switching to a more stable network environment

validation.title: Form Validation Failed
validation.message: The entered information does not meet requirements
validation.suggestion: Please check required fields and data formats to ensure all information is correctly filled

submit.title: Form Submission Failed
submit.suggestion: Please check network connection and input content, then try again

invalid.title: Invalid Drag Operation
invalid.message: Cannot drag item to this location
invalid.suggestion: Please check if the target location accepts this type of item

failed.title: Drag Operation Failed
failed.suggestion: Please try again or refresh the page

render.title: Chart Rendering Failed
render.suggestion: Please check if data format is correct, or try refreshing the page

data.title: Chart Data Error
data.message: Chart data is incomplete or in incorrect format
data.suggestion: Please check data source or adjust query conditions

load.title: Theme Loading Failed
load.suggestion: Please try another theme or restart the application

apply.title: Theme Application Failed
apply.suggestion: Please check theme configuration or restore default theme

save.title: Layout Save Failed
save.message: Unable to save current layout configuration
save.suggestion: Please check storage permissions or try again later

restore.title: Layout Restore Failed
restore.suggestion: Please try restoring default layout or reconfigure

load.title: Component Loading Failed
load.suggestion: Please refresh the page or contact technical support

notFound.title: Extension Loading Failed
notFound.message: Cannot find the specified extension file
notFound.suggestion: Please check if the extension is correctly installed, or try reinstalling the extension

incompatible.title: Extension Incompatible
incompatible.message: Extension is incompatible with current application version
incompatible.suggestion: Please update the extension to the latest version or use a compatible version

corrupt.title: Extension File Corrupted
corrupt.message: Extension file is damaged or incomplete
corrupt.suggestion: Please reinstall the extension or download it again

permission.title: Extension Installation Failed
permission.suggestion: Please run the application with administrator privileges or contact system administrator

space.title: Installation Failed
space.message: Insufficient disk space to install extension
space.suggestion: Please clean up disk space and try again

conflict.title: Extension Conflict
conflict.suggestion: Please uninstall conflicting extensions first or contact extension developer

inUse.title: Uninstallation Failed
inUse.message: Extension is currently in use and cannot be uninstalled
inUse.suggestion: Please close related functions and try again

permission.title: Uninstallation Failed
permission.suggestion: Please run the application with administrator privileges

missing.title: Dependency Missing
missing.message: Extension depends on other extensions that are not installed

version.title: Dependency Version Mismatch
version.message: Dependent extension version does not meet requirements
version.suggestion: Please update dependent extensions to compatible versions

tooOld.title: Extension Version Too Old
tooOld.message: Extension version is too old and may have security risks
tooOld.suggestion: Recommend updating to the latest version

tooNew.title: Extension Version Too New
tooNew.message: Extension version is too new and incompatible with current application
tooNew.suggestion: Please wait for application update or use a lower version extension

denied.title: Permission Request Denied
denied.suggestion: Please grant necessary permissions in settings for extension to work properly

excessive.title: Excessive Permission Request
excessive.message: Extension requested permissions exceed its functional requirements
excessive.suggestion: For security reasons, please carefully review permission requests or use other extensions

unavailable.title: API Unavailable
unavailable.message: Extension called API is not available in current version
unavailable.suggestion: Please update application or contact extension developer

deprecated.title: API Deprecated
deprecated.suggestion: Recommend contacting extension developer to update extension

expired.title: Session Expired
expired.suggestion: Please log in again to continue

invalid.title: Invalid Session
invalid.message: Session information is invalid or has been tampered with
invalid.suggestion: Please log in again for security reasons

concurrent.title: Concurrent Login
concurrent.message: Account is logged in on another device
concurrent.suggestion: If this is not you, please change password immediately

insufficient.title: Insufficient Permissions
insufficient.message: You do not have permission to perform this operation
insufficient.suggestion: Please contact administrator to obtain necessary permissions

expired.title: Permissions Expired
expired.suggestion: Please contact administrator to renew permissions

expired.title: Certificate Expired
expired.suggestion: Please contact system administrator to update certificate

invalid.title: Invalid Certificate
invalid.message: SSL certificate is invalid or untrusted
invalid.suggestion: Please check network security settings or contact administrator

expired.title: Access Token Expired
expired.suggestion: Please log in again to get a new access token

invalid.title: Invalid Token
invalid.message: Authentication token is invalid or has been tampered with
invalid.suggestion: Please log in again for security reasons

revoked.title: Token Revoked
revoked.suggestion: Please log in again or contact administrator

failed.title: Authentication Failed
failed.suggestion: Please check credentials or reset password

timeout.title: Authentication Timeout
timeout.suggestion: Please check network connection and try again

locked.title: Account Locked
locked.message: Account has been locked due to too many failed login attempts
locked.suggestion: Please wait {{duration}} minutes or contact administrator

denied.title: Access Denied
denied.message: You do not have access to this resource
denied.suggestion: Please contact administrator if you need access

scopeInsufficient.title: Insufficient Authorization Scope
scopeInsufficient.message: Current authorization scope does not include this operation

port.title: Application Startup Failed
port.message: Port is occupied, unable to start application
port.suggestion: Please close programs occupying the port, or modify application port configuration

config.title: Startup Failed
config.suggestion: Please check configuration file or restore default configuration

dependency.title: Startup Failed
dependency.suggestion: Please reinstall the application or install missing dependencies

unsaved.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved.suggestion: Please save changes before closing, or changes will be lost

timeout.title: Shutdown Timeout
timeout.message: Application did not close properly within specified time
timeout.suggestion: Please force quit or wait for operation to complete

permission.title: Update Failed
permission.suggestion: Please run update with administrator privileges, or manually download the latest version

network.title: Update Failed
network.suggestion: Please check network connection or manually download the update

verify.title: Update Failed
verify.suggestion: Please download again or use official channels

parse.title: Configuration Parse Error
parse.suggestion: Please check configuration file format or restore default configuration

save.title: Configuration Save Failed
save.suggestion: Please check file permissions or disk space

corrupt.title: Configuration File Corrupted
corrupt.suggestion: Recommend restoring backup or using default configuration

version.title: Data Migration Failed
version.suggestion: Please backup data first, then contact technical support

integrity.title: Migration Failed
integrity.suggestion: Please restore from backup or contact technical support

space.title: Backup Failed
space.message: Insufficient disk space to create backup
space.suggestion: Please clean up disk space or choose another backup location

permission.title: Backup Failed
permission.message: No permission to write backup file
permission.suggestion: Please check directory permissions or choose another location

corrupt.title: Backup Corrupted
corrupt.message: Backup file is damaged and cannot be restored
corrupt.suggestion: Please use another backup or contact technical support
